summary: From 0.0s to 2.0s, the car is driving on a straight road with a silver car in front. A motorcycle is also visible in the distance. A male wearing a black jacket is walking on the right side of the road. At 3.0s, a young boy wearing a black jacket and pants suddenly runs into the road from the right side. From 11.4s to 14.2s, a man wearing a dark jacket is walking from right to left across the road in front of the car.
key_objects: Right side: A young boy wearing a black jacket and pants, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly runs into the road, creating a ghost probing situation.
Right side: A man wearing a dark jacket, approximately 8 meters away, is walking from right to left across the road, creating a potential ghost probing situation.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a two-lane road. The speed appears to be moderate, likely due to the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians in the vicinity. The driver maintains a consistent speed and lane position, suggesting they are monitoring the road conditions and adjusting their driving accordingly.
